title: MITE-CHATBOT
description: Chatbot app which helps users to get everything they needed to know about Mangalore Institute of Technology.

title: JOB-FINDER
description: The app offers comprehensive job search functionality, empowering users to find employment opportunities that match their preferences. With customizable filters, users can refine their search based on criteria such as  industry, job type. The platform also allows users to save job listings of interest for future reference, enabling them to easily revisit and review them later.

title: QUIZ GAME
description: This is a Node.js CLI game built with Inquirer library where you get to answer a series of JavaScript-related questions, You win the game by answering all the questions correctly.

title: EMOTION EYE
description: EmotionEye is an emotion detection application built using Firebase ML Kit and Kotlin. It leverages the power of machine learning to analyze and identify human emotions from images accurately. With EmotionEye, you can gain valuable insights into the emotional states of individuals, enabling you to develop applications in various domains such as market research, customer feedback analysis, and human-computer interaction.

title: BMI-CALCULATOR
description: The Body Mass Calculator App is a simple application designed to calculate the body mass index (BMI) of an individual. BMI is a commonly used measure to determine if a person has a healthy weight for their height. The app is built in Flutter and can be easily used on any device. The user enters their weight and height, and the app automatically calculates their BMI and displays the results.

title: CHATBOT FOR BUSINESS WORK
description: The chatbot interprets the user's input, understands the context and intent, and generates relevant responses accordingly. It can answer questions, provide recommendations, perform tasks, offer customer support, and even engage in casual conversations.

title: CHAT-GPT
description: ChatGPT App is a simple mobile application built on Flutter, which allows users to chat with an AI-powered conversational agent called ChatGPT. ChatGPT is a language model trained by OpenAI, based on the GPT-3.5 architecture, which can understand and respond to natural language input.

title: OBJECT MOTION DETECTOR
description: This project detects motion in a video stream from a webcam and generates a CSV file with the start and end times of each motion event.

title: EMOTION DETECTOR
description: This project is an implementation of Emotion Detection using Keras, AI, and Python. It uses a deep neural network (DNN) to analyze facial expressions and detect the emotion being displayed. The DNN is trained on a dataset of images labeled with the four basic emotions: happy, sad, angry, surprised.
